title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Spending in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 5 data points.
Overall Spending in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Spending in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from Just_Mercy to Bad_Boys_for_Life, and lastly slightly increasing from Bad_Boys_for_Life to 1917.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year Dolittle and 1917.
Max Spending in million U.S. dollars about 10.41 was recorded at Year 1917
Min Spending in million U.S. dollars about 3.72 was recorded at Year Just_Mercy
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Spending in million U.S. dollars with a total of 5 data points. The chart has one significant trend.
This trend is increasing which exists from 1917 to Just_Mercy.
